event.description: Travis Jankowski grounds out softly to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Manuel Margot strikes out swinging.
Wil Myers lines out sharply to second baseman Chase Utley.
Yangervis Solarte doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Ryan Schimpf lines out softly to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Hunter Renfroe pops out to second baseman Chase Utley.
Hector Sanchez lines out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Erick Aybar grounds out, second baseman Chase Utley to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Jered Weaver strikes out swinging.
Travis Jankowski lines out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Manuel Margot grounds out, first baseman Adrian Gonzalez to pitcher Brandon McCarthy.
Wil Myers grounds out, third baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Yangervis Solarte flies out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Ryan Schimpf flies out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Hunter Renfroe singles on a ground ball to left fielder Andrew Toles.

Erick Aybar grounds out, second baseman Chase Utley to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Allen Cordoba replaces Jered Weaver.
Allen Cordoba grounds out, third baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Travis Jankowski singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Manuel Margot strikes out swinging.
Wil Myers homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Travis Jankowski scores.
Yangervis Solarte walks.
Ryan Schimpf strikes out on a foul tip.
Pitching Change: Luis Avilan replaces Brandon McCarthy, batting 9th, replacing Enrique Hernandez.
Hunter Renfroe singles on a line drive to right fielder Yasiel Puig.
Hector Sanchez strikes out swinging. Hunter Renfroe steals (1) 2nd base.
Erick Aybar walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Christian Bethancourt replaces Craig Stammen.
Christian Bethancourt flies out to right fielder Yasiel Puig. Hunter Renfroe to 3rd.
Travis Jankowski reaches on a fielder's choice out, first baseman Adrian Gonzalez to catcher Austin Barnes. Hunter Renfroe out at home.
Los Angeles Dodgers center fielder Joc Pederson ejected by HP umpire David Rackley.
Defensive switch from left field to center field for Andrew Toles.
Pitching Change: Chris Hatcher replaces Luis Avilan, batting 5th, replacing center fielder Joc Pederson.
Scott Van Slyke remains in the game as the left fielder.

Wil Myers strikes out swinging.

Pitching Change: Jarred Cosart replaces Jered Weaver, batting 9th, replacing Allen Cordoba.

Padres challenged (tag play), call on the field was upheld: With Logan Forsythe batting, Enrique Hernandez steals (1) home. Corey Seager steals (1) 2nd base.
